Title: 10.2.5 Log Authentication and User Management Events

Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 10.2.5

==Policy Statement==

Log authentication and user management events.

==Policy Purpose==

Log authentication events to help identify users who were online when an incident was taking place. Log user management events to help investigate unauthorized changes to user accounts.

==Related Guidance==

* [[d50dc4ba-337d-4026-8646-95fe2cf6f0c8|Log Authentication Events]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[9740a716-f664-443c-af33-993a8738e81b|Authentication Events Are Logged]]
